name: Microwave Carbonara Bowls with Mixed Veg and Warm Rolls
description: Family-friendly spaghetti carbonara heated in minutes, served with microwave mixed vegetables and warm rolls. Zero chili heat and minimal steps.
prep_steps: Read heating directions on the spaghetti carbonara, mixed vegetables, and rolls packages.
Pierce or vent films on the ready meals as directed.
cook_steps: Microwave the spaghetti carbonara according to pack directions (heat in batches if needed). Stir and divide into 4 bowls.
Microwave the mixed vegetables per pack directions until hot.
Warm the rolls in the microwave for 20–40 seconds until soft.
Serve carbonara with a side of mixed vegetables and a warm roll on each plate. Season with salt and pepper if desired.
